name: Light Fingers
description:
What do skulking thieves do after a night of procuring shady spoils? They gather at a favourite tavern and wager it away on a friendly game ofÂ Light Fingers!

Played on a magical clockworks game board, this turn-based multiplayer game has real-time action and devious opportunities for misdirection, all in the pursuit of securing more loot than your opponents.
intro: A game of friendly pilfering & fiendish provocation.
